title: ‘Shooter’ opens fire inside New Hampshire church injuring ‘multiple people’
text:
(Picture: Google Maps)

Multiple people have reportedly been shot at a church in New Hampshire.

It is believed several people were shot when the incident broke out at New England Pentecostal Ministries, in Pelham, on Saturday morning.

So far, it is not yet known if there have been any fatalities, nor have the extent of victims’ injuries been revealed.

Emergency services and police are currently on the scene.

Video from Pelham, NH scene. A number of ambulances, state, and local police pic.twitter.com/uyQ2cOeoT0 — Korey O'Brien (@koreyobrienTV) October 12, 2019

This is a breaking news story, more to follow.
